aircraft.value: Atlas Cargo - AC-9360-261 at Maintenance Hub-Y

defect_observed.value: Air conditioning pack failure. Abnormality observed during system test.

root_cause.value: Environmental exposure causing accelerated degradation of protective coatings

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Pressurization component. Analysis of operational data indicated parameter deviation.

corrective_action.value: Repair damaged area using approved repair scheme

preventive_action.value: Reduce inspection interval for affected component type

remarks_investigation.value: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.

remarks_design.value: Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions. Date: 04/06/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality control procedures verified. Recommend periodic surveillance of manufacturing facility. Date: 07/06/2023 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Fleet experience reviewed. Similar occurrences noted on other platforms. Support fleet-wide inspection. Date: 08/06/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality aspects from regulatory perspective reviewed. Investigation methodology is comprehensive and acceptable. Date: 07/06/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Airworthiness implications assessed. Recommend issuance of technical directive for fleet-wide compliance. Date: 13/06/2023 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer

a) Root Cause Analysis: Environmental exposure causing accelerated degradation of protective coatings

operational data indicated parameter deviation.
